name: It sucks, y'know
description:
A short game about you and your mom.

But instead of feeling like home, why does it feel like the opposite instead?

-ˋˏ✄┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈

INCLUDES:

  1. 3 CGs
  2. 4 endings
  3. 10-15 minutes of playtime (at most-)

-ˋˏ✄┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈

⚠️WARNING⚠️

---> parental verbal abuse, fat-shaming, loud sounds (especially during the beginning of the game as the intro), gaslighting, mentions of disownment and abandonment.

 -ˋˏ✄┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈    

CREDITS:

Art, voice acting, music, code, and writing by rice373.
